entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, a wizard who attends Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

entities.name: hogwarts school of witchcraft and wizardry
entities.description: A magical school where Harry Potter learns magic.

entities.name: dursleys
entities.description: Harry's cruel and neglectful Muggle relatives.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: The Potions master at Hogwarts who is disliked by Harry.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: The gamekeeper at Hogwarts who befriends Harry.

entities.name: quidditch
entities.description: A popular sport in the wizarding world where players fly on broomsticks.
